specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Bonded Bonded fabric is created by fusing two different layers into one, which improves durability. When a winter outer layer is combined with a warm lining, it enhances insulation while also supporting a structured, defined silhouette. Chemical > Wicking Wicking is a textile treatment that enables fabric to draw moisture or sweat away from the skin and help it evaporate quickly. This keeps the wearer cool and fresh.
specifications.Dye Method: Cation Dye Cation-dyed fabrics feature a unique heather effect that varies based on the ratio of cation-dyeable polyester fibers. When applied to cotton blends, the dye only colors the surface, resulting in a natural fading and vintage appearance. Due to this process, color variations may occur between production lots, and the yardage may differ slightly from the provided swatches.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance UV Protection A treatment to reduce fabric exposure to UV rays through application of a UV blocking agent that absorbs or scatters UV rays. Anti-Microbial Fabric with an antibacterial effect created by inserting silver into yarns or through silver nano coating. Quick Dry Quick dry is a technical fabric that wicks away sweat and moisture, helping to maintain a cool and fresh feeling. Brand Yarn ATB-UV+ ATB-UV+ is the future generation of anti-bacterial fibers. Cutting edge perspiration - absorption/evaporation technologies create a fiber that remains 99.9% bacteria free. Blocks UV-B(290~320mm) & UV-A(320~400mm). Recommended Use Activewear, Dresses
